item.title: Management
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
Company has developed the scientific system of Accounting, Marketing Management, Reduction Techniques, Development of Internal Controls System, Preparation of Accounting Manual with Coding System, Planning of Constitutional Structure with risk analysis, Planning of Personnel and Office Management.

The post Management first appeared on RVMC Consultants.
